column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.1
#T_SP=webanno.custom.NEGATION|Negations
#Text=Boy it's hard to begin a refutation on Charles petty little lies and hypocrisy.
#Text=An agent of the CIA and the Pentagon, America's Great War Machine, he is most definitely.
#Text=A dispute between China, Taiwan, Vietnam and others on the extent of their respective sovereignty in the S.
#Text=China Sea dates back to end of WW2, but originated around 1900.
#Text=It's been a century of on/off squabbles, their own affairs.
#Text=But when Hillary became SoS a few years ago she proclaimed with great hubris Asia Pivot!
#Text=What this means is the U.S. will install massive military forces in the region to contain & control China.
#Text=And thus the Obama regime inserted itself into this century old affair, made it America's business, to cover the real goal of Asia domination.
#Text=To meddle in this adventure and see what come out of it just like Syria.
#Text=And if its war so much the better.
#Text=The design is classic but most evil.
#Text=Nobody like to be 'contained' and China responded.
#Text=[I like to see America being 'contained' one day and enjoy to see how it jumps and cries like a bullied child.]The so-called Tribunal is not a UN-sponsored body.
#Text=It is just an opinion body in a far away European country with absolutely no court power.
#Text=It deals only with economic matters, not politics or border.
#Text=Philippines previous president asked it to pass an opinion on the matter of Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ), not border or sovereignty.
#Text=Specifically, what size of an island qualified for EEZ.
#Text=The Tribunal reports that NO island or sandbar or reclaimed islands currently in the SCS qualify for EEZ.
#Text=It also defined what size will qualify.
#Text=That's it.
#Text=No islands built or claimed by all parties - China, Taiwan, Philippines, Vietnam, Malaysia is an EEZ and therefore not a basis for border.
#Text=That's the opinion for this body.
#Text=The meaning is simply that they can build bigger islands to fit the EEZ definition, or just go sit down and work out a border solution.
#Text=China is willing to talk but not with the U.S. inserting itself in the matter.
#Text=The new Philippine president agreed and they will begin the talk.
#Text=Once they formed a framework others may join to effect a solution.
#Text=This of course is very bad news for American war mongers and Asian Pivoters.
#Text=What would they do without the excuse to insert even more massive forces than they currently have in the region, to ensure there is a Vietnam War 2.0 to match Cold War 2.0 in Europe?
#Text=Thus you have CIA puppet like Charles writing this article in desperation.
